R

Reversi - <Unnamed>中的类
This class construct the process of the Reversi game, it will call other classes to get input and output, initialize the table, place tokens, and check which player wins.
Reversi() - 类 的构造器Reversi
 
ReversiController - controller中的类
This class is the controller of the Reversi game which has the following purpose: 1. check the placeable locations on the board. 2. flip the tokens. 3. get the scores.
ReversiController(ReversiModel) - 类 的构造器controller.ReversiController
This is the constructor of the controller which initialize a model.
ReversiControllerTest - tests中的类
 
ReversiControllerTest() - 类 的构造器tests.ReversiControllerTest
 
ReversiModel - model中的类
This class is the model of the Reversi game which is to initialize the table and place the tokens.
ReversiModel() - 类 的构造器model.ReversiModel
This is the constructor of the model which generate a default table.
ReversiView - view中的类
This class is the view of the Reversi game which is not only get the input from the user, but also to print the outputs.
ReversiView() - 类 的构造器view.ReversiView
This is the constructor of the view which initialize a menu and print it out.
